Name: Jos√© Santos
description:
Jose Santos is 43 years old. He is an agricultural technician and he works in agriculture. He is the father of 3 children of school age. Santos is a hard-working man, responsible and entrepreneurial. The loan will serve as capital to buy fertilizers and agronomic management of his tara trees.
He has 13 years in the business and his dreams are to educate his children, improve his economic income, and the living conditions of his family.
